subject: 788,800 physician records by specialty
body:

Sortable Fields: 

* First name
* Last name
* Title
* Specialty
* Address (city, state, zip, county)
* Medical School Attended
* Location of Residency Training
* Phone
* Fax
* Email
* Website
* Primary Specialty
* Secondary Specialty
* Graduation Year
* Major Activity
* Hospital
* Group Practice
* Abms Certification

Sale price until Friday May 11 - $99 each specialty or all of them for $399.

For more information or to place an order please call 206-600-5313 or for faster service send an
email to doctorsintheusa@hotmail.com









To be excluded from future campaigns, please send a blank email with "999" in the subject field.
